item.description:
Geronimo Bar and Grill will be hosting a Fundraiser for Brighter World Books.

This is a non-profit organization that collects and sends books to Pretoria Secondary School in Pretoria, South Africa.
The goal is to fill the school's library with books, both text books and fiction for all ages.

This event will start at 5:00 pm on Geronimo's Patio.
The ticket price is $15.00 per person.

Geronimo Bar and Grill will provide a Complimentary Buffet and Drink
Specials throughout this event as well as a FREE margarita!

100 % of ticket sales will be used towards the shipping cost to send the books to South Africa. Donations of books will also be accepted at the time of the event, as will additional monetary amounts.

For more information, visit
www.brighterworldbooks.org

We look forward to seeing you on Tuesday, June 29th

Contact is Melissa: 203.232.9626
item.name: Brighter World Books Fundraiser
